pages.text: Zombie Servants are simple in their functions, kill anyone who hurts you or any hostile creatures and follow you much like Tamed Wolves, only taller and stinkier

Zombie Servants can be summoned or converted into different variants. Casting the Rotting Focus in a Desert exposed to the sky will summon a Husk Servant, casting it underwater summons a Drowned Servant.
Drowned Servants can accept Tridents and will attack the same way as a regular Drowned. Zombie Servants in all variants can accept any Armor but only accept Swords or Axes.
Zombified Piglin Servants are immune to fire and lava, and when hit by a non-ally entity will cry out and cause any surrounding non-summoned Zombified Piglin to be hostile towards their attacker.
